titleStmt.title: The yearly intelligencer, or, A perfect chronology of all the battailes, sieges, conflicts, actions, exploits, and all other signal and remarkable passages which have happ'ned in the world from September the 29th, 1671 to September the 29th, 1672 collected by William Andrevvs.
titleStmt.author: Andrews, William, ca. 1635-1713.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Crowch for T. Vere,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
